en.name: The Moles Welcome You
en.description: When the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack enemies, the wearer gains one stack of Mischievous. Each stack increases the wearer's ATK by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}.

zh.name: 鼹鼠党欢迎你
zh.description: 装备者施放普攻、战技或终结技攻击敌方目标后，分别获取一层【淘气值】。每层使装备者的攻击力提高{{12//15//18//21//24%}}。
